commentBody: I cannot believe I am reading yet another NYTimes article complaining about what some Sanders supporters are saying to some Clinton supporters--I wish I could find an equal number of articles soberly analyzing their policy positions! And what is everyone so concerned about? First, there are millions of Sanders supporters and millions of Clinton supporters; it is easy to find misbehavers in such a crowd. Second, all these articles remind me strongly of how my four-year old tattles on his friend's misbehavior. There are so many better ways to deal with their rivalry than "gotcha" journalism.

replies.commentBody: The thesis and context of this piece goes far beyond Berniebros which is only of one of many examples written about.
